attributes.action: make government work for the people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current government works to perpetuate itself. If government were a true reflection of the society it purports to want to create, it would work to make itself obsolete. Until it can prove this is its prime reason, all MP's salaries must be reduced to minimum wage.

rejection.details: Your petition is ambigious. Please reword to identify concrete actions you would like the Government to take.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
